body: Live from the #craftfair! Come hang out while I check out some awesome #handmade goods. What should I look for? #supportlocal #art

comments.body: This looks fun! See if you can find any cool pottery—handmade mugs are the best!
@56565 Great idea! Just spotted a booth with some beautiful ceramic mugs. I might have to grab one!
Any interesting jewelry? I’m always on the lookout for unique handmade necklaces.
@67676 Oh yeah! There’s a booth here with some amazing gemstone necklaces. Really unique designs!
Check out any artwork! Handmade prints or paintings would make great holiday gifts.
@78787 Good call! I just found a local artist selling watercolor prints of cityscapes. These would make perfect gifts!
I always love the candles at craft fairs! See if you can find any cool handmade candles with unique scents.
@89898 Found them! There’s a booth with soy candles, and they have scents like ‘Autumn Forest’ and ‘Spiced Chai.’ Smells amazing!
Any good food stalls? Craft fairs usually have the best homemade snacks!
@23232 Yes! I just grabbed some homemade fudge and locally made honey. This is definitely the place for snacks!
